# BASH scripts for FASTA files

## fasta_Keep_Longest.sh

This BASH script extracts the longest sequence of a FASTA file.

## Example ##

  `fasta_Keep_Longest.sh Mus_musculus_483LEX_reference_names.fas`
 
```python
 
 Longest sequence: 
  	Name = Mus_musculus_10194_ENSG00000179981_000_TSHZ1 
  	Length = 3180 
  	Sequence = 
```

## Problem detection ##

Each sequence should be written on a single line.

  `fasta_Keep_Longest.sh test.fas`
 
```
    Sorry ... Your FASTA file is not UNILINE !
```
